divs: sighting detailssighting report: this experience had happen some years ago and there had been a reason i was reluctant to report it. the day the ufo made its appearance was sept 14th 2000, in monroe twp. n.j., a little before sunset. i, however, did not discover it had been there until i had had the pictures, which were taken that day, for at least a few weeks or even a couple of months. it was my wedding day and i was quite uneasy. i just wed my foreign, arabic husband in a civil ceremony at the local courthouse. i was considering all our differences, my uncertainties and doubts from right after the moment i had said, 93i do=94. we drove back to my parent=92s house and i was uplifted to see a rainbow in the sky. at certain angles it gave the visual effect as if landing directly upon my parents home. my new husband and myself ran to stand in the front yard as my parents took a number of pictures. the rainbow slowly faded away and at this time we all took turns posing for several more shots. the picture in question is of my mother and myself standing under a tree in the back yard. a bright egg shaped object is in the background against a dusk sky of bright orange. i do not know why i didn=92t notice it straight away; perhaps i was so distracted by the other photos with the rainbow. currently i only have one picture of this object from the actual negative (non-digital camera). i do have copies scanned from it into digital format. i=92m not certain where the negatives are, though i=92m pretty certain i have them. i have recently looked into ufo media and investigations so to find a group who is critical and will honestly examine what i have, rather then just adding it to a slew of falsehoods as if it is fact without proper scrutiny. i truly would like to be certain if it is what it may appear to be. i do not want to send it off to here and there. i am a published author of a serious moral; (at least to me) futuristic fiction work and do not wish for my name to be tainted with an association to a discreditable group. this is why i have decided to approach your network, after some research of your work, dedications and associations, to offer to send you a digital copy of the picture, and\or meet so the photo itself can be examined. i guess since i=92m going through with this i will also now hunt to locate the negatives. upon finding them i will make copies as well as having it ready for any examinations. the reason i have been reluctant to report, is because up until literally this week, my husband has been ever so against the idea of et=92s and ufo possibilities. we then watched a show on the matter a couple of days ago and then i showed him some video clips of ufos on the web. he was shocked at the world trades center clip, and he now states he believes in the possibility at 95% degree. i=92m amazed at the turn around because not only is he entertaining the possibilities himself, but he also is talking about what i had showed him to his arabic friends and sharing the video clip site with them and all with some serious excitement. i now can finally share what could be our own, special, personal experience with a ufo, with finally his support rather then fear.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Pemberton Township
There were no other sightings in Pemberton Township on or around February 26th 2005
